hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "The best alms is that which you give when you are rich, and you should start first to support your dependants

chapter.ara-name: باب وُجُوبِ النَّفَقَةِ عَلَى الأَهْلِ وَالْعِيَالِ
chapter.eng-name: It is obligatory to spend for one's wife and household.
